PageTitle: reset ipv6 nd packet statistics bridge-domain
FuncDef: The reset ipv6 nd packet statistics bridge-domain command clears ND message statistics in a specified BD.
CLIs: reset ipv6 nd packet statistics bridge-domain [ <bd-id> ]

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the ID of the BD in which ND message statistics are cleared.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 16777215.

Examples: <HUAWEI> reset ipv6 nd packet statistics bridge-domain 10
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
When a user needs to collect statistics about ND message sending and receiving in a BD within a specified period, run the reset ipv6 nd packet statistics bridge-domain command to clear the original ND message statistics in the BD.
